Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20005306 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of D.L.K. Restaurant Corp., d/b/a Pertutti Caffe, to continue to, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 2888 Broadway, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 9.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Application no. 20005344 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of 63rd Street Bagel Café, Inc., d/b/a Hot and Crusty Bagel, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 1201 Second Avenue, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Zoning resolution amendment application no. 000454 ZRM, pursuant to §197-d and §200 of the New York City Charter, concerning changes in the text of the zoning resolution, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. CM District 1, relating: Section 84-132 of the Special Battery Park District.
